entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sandspit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:14 AM PST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sandspit Airport 07:48 AM PST Friday 06 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 6.6°C
Pressure: 99.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: 4.5°C
Wind: S 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this morning. Periods of rain beginning near noon. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 late this morning. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 increasing to 80 gusting to 100 near midnight. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 6.
